ai-tika-s0402t12:1_2: ‘Giving by a giver’ is a term for others.
ai-tika-s0402t12:1_3: Here is of two kinds: give the meaning, etc., that is to say, “with giving,” and etc., with the giving of, etc.,
ai-tika-s0402t12:1_4: Herein, it is to be given in order to give by means of two.
ai-tika-s0402t12:1_5: (And) he has undertaken the deathless thus: “It is the right way that is the right way which is the right way.
ai-tika-s0402t12:2_0: Sleep in the second, whatever is empty, so empty,
ai-tika-s0402t12:3_0: The proper conduct of gifts is finished.
